label: 町組
本: Cities in Medieval Japan. ACTA ASIATICA, 44 . The Tōhō Gakkai . 1983
説明文: But even if these township communities soon organized federations (chōgumi 町組)↓ and managed to weaken the control of the capital rentiers by assuming the responsibility of paying the frontage ground rents collectively, they were still some distance from gaining self-government in administrative and police affairs. [SS]
